spiritsExplanation:
The workout in question is primarily characterized as 'High-Energy & Intense' with a score of 0.7. Evidence from the title, description, and viewer comments supports this classification: the description mentions that the workout will 'leave you dripping sweat,' indicating a high level of exertion and energy. Comments highlight the inclusion of cardio and strength components, aligning with a vigorous, total body workout typically associated with high-intensity exercise. Moreover, the mention of HIIT-style elements further solidifies its intensity.

Additionally, a secondary spirit, 'Flow & Rhythm,' is identified with a score of 0.4. This is inferred from the emphasis on continuous movement and coordination as indicated by the mention of 'do-it-along-with-us real-time workout show' and 'class regularly covers workout classes and trends.' These aspects suggest a potential rhythmic flow throughout the session, although it remains a supplementary aspect to the overall intense nature of the workout.

The tags and channel focus on varied dynamic workouts, confirming this dual spirit classification while excluding spirits like 'Structured & Disciplined' or 'Sport & Agility' due to lack of specific focus in the metadata.
